column5: Our relaxing cottage on 35th street is walking distance to the Seawall, restaurants, family-friendly activities, and nightlife. Youâ€™ll love our place because of the comfy beds, the open concept, the kitchen amenities, the coziness, and the high ceilings. You will surely feel at home once you arrive and settle in. Our place is great for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. It is located 5 blocks from the seawall in a very safe and nice neighborhood. Come see for yourself and enjoy!
